EnableActiveAlert.description: 开通一键告警的云服务。

AutoInstall.description:
现有ECS主机是否自动安装云监控插件。取值：

- true

- false

Success.description:
操作是否成功。取值：

- true：成功。

- false：失败。

EnableInstallAgentNewECS.description:
新购ECS主机是否自动安装云监控插件。取值：

- true

- false

400.errorMessage: The specified parameter is not valid.

500.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error.

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "EnableActiveAlert": "redis,rds,ecs", "RequestId": "E9F4FA2A-54BE-4EF9-9D1D-1A0B1DC86B8D", "AutoInstall": true, "Success": true, "EnableInstallAgentNewECS": true, "Code": "200", "Message": "The Request is not authorization." }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":" true true B4EB0F95-3181-4E8F-B32E-8C3734E8F88E 200 true ","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询云监控插件的配置信息
summary: 调用DescribeMonitoringAgentConfig接口查询云监控插件的配置信息。
